title: Is 2020 the best year for Blackpink? - Quora

response.answer_text: From a Blink’s perspective I’d definitely say yes! They are getting a full length album 4 years after their debut. So far they’ve only had mini albums so I can say the girls ad well as other fellow Blinks must be very excited. Also, we’ve had a pre-release single HYLT and the upcoming Selpink collab ‘Ice Cream’. Overall, this year has been by far the best for BP and Blinks :)
I mean I hope so! It’s been great ever since there hylt mv has released and there releasing an album with over 10 SONGS IN IT! Finally 😭😭🥰🥰.
